Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Ubuntu Server LTS for x86-64 Containers) 2022.1 (Build 209U)
Export.Routine:
; FROM https://github.com/WorldVistA/VistA-FHIR-Data-Loader/blob/master/src/SYNINIT.m ; written by: Sam Habiel ; SEe above repro for licnse information
EN ; D MES^XPDUTL("") D MES^XPDUTL("Codespace VistA ex Init") D MES^XPDUTL("Provider "_$$PROV(1)) Q
PROV(rePopulate) ;[Public $$] Create Generic User (provider) ; ASSUMPTION: DUZ MUST HAVE XUMGR OTHERWISE FILEMAN WILL BLOCK YOU! N NAME S NAME="PROVIDER,VISTAJS" ; Constant n C0XIEN s C0XIEN=$O(^VA(200,"B",NAME,0)) if C0XIEN,'$get(rePopulate) quit C0XIEN if C0XIEN,$get(rePopulate) do . new DA,DIK . set DA=C0XIEN . set DIK="^VA(200," . do ^DIK . kill C0XIEN . set C0XIEN(1)=DA ; N C0XFDA,C0XERR,DIERR S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",.01)=NAME S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",1)="USP" ; Initials S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",28)=100 ; Mail Code S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",53.1)=1 ; Authorized to write meds S C0XFDA(200.05,"?+2,?+1,",.01)="`144" ; Person Class - Allopathic docs. S C0XFDA(200.05,"?+2,?+1,",2)=2000101 ; Date active ; ; Security keys S C0XFDA(200.051,"?+3,?+1,",.01)="PROVIDER" S C0XFDA(200.051,"?+4,?+1,",.01)="ORES" S C0XFDA(200.051,"?+10,?+1,",.01)="LRLAB" S C0XFDA(200.051,"?+11,?+1,",.01)="LRVERIFY" ; ; Access and Verify Codes so we can log in as the provider if we want to ; We must pre-hash them as that's not in the IT S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",2)=$$EN^XUSHSH("VISTAJS123") ; ac S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",11)=$$EN^XUSHSH("VISTAJS123!!") ; vc S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",7.2)=1 ; verify code never expires ; ; Electronic Signature ; Input transform hashes this guy S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",20.4)="123456" ; ; Primary Menu S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",201)="`"_$$FIND1^DIC(19,,"QX","XUCORE","B") ; ; Secondary Menu (CPRS, etc) S C0XFDA(200.03,"?+5,?+1,",.01)="`"_$$FIND1^DIC(19,,"QX","OR CPRS GUI CHART","B") S C0XFDA(200.03,"?+7,?+1,",.01)="`"_$$FIND1^DIC(19,,"QX","SDECRPC","B") ; ; Restrict Patient Selection S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",101.01)="NO" ; ; CPRS Tabs S C0XFDA(200.010113,"?+6,?+1,",.01)="COR" S C0XFDA(200.010113,"?+6,?+1,",.02)="T-1" ; ; Service/Section S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",29)="`"_$$MEDSS() ; ; NPI - Ferdi made this one up. S C0XFDA(200,"?+1,",41.99)="9990000348" ; N DIC S DIC(0)="" ; An XREF in File 200 requires this. D UPDATE^DIE("E",$NA(C0XFDA),$NA(C0XIEN),$NA(C0XERR)) ; Typical UPDATE I $D(DIERR) S $EC=",U1," ; ; Fix verify code change date to the far future N FDA S FDA(200,C0XIEN(1)_",",11.2)=$$FMTH^XLFDT($$FMADD^XLFDT(DT,3000)) ; ; Signature block. Do this as internal values to prevent name check in 20.2. S FDA(200,C0XIEN(1)_",",20.2)="VISTA PROVIDER, MD" S FDA(200,C0XIEN(1)_",",20.3)="Staff Physician" ; D FILE^DIE(,$NA(FDA)) I $D(DIERR) S $EC=",U1," ; Q C0XIEN(1) ;Provider IEN
MEDSS() ; [Public $$] Create Medical Service/Section N NAME S NAME="MEDICINE" Q:$O(^DIC(49,"B",NAME,0)) $O(^(0)) ; N FDA,IEN,DIERR S FDA(49,"?+1,",.01)=NAME S FDA(49,"?+1,",1)="MED" S FDA(49,"?+1,",1.5)="MED" S FDA(49,"?+1,",1.7)="PATIENT CARE" D UPDATE^DIE("E",$NA(FDA),$NA(IEN)) I $D(DIERR) S $EC=",U1," QUIT IEN(1)
